title: Overwrite AppV1 with V10000 “NEXUS OMNIVERSE” (local-only) and ensure it compiles

requirements.summary: Fully overwrite frontend/src/AppV1.jsx with the user-provided V10000 “NEXUS OMNIVERSE” code, including local-only persisted brain behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` matches the user-provided V10000 code block as the complete application UI/logic (Landing → Client Explorer → Pro Studio/Cockpit).
The local persistence key used by the app brain is exactly `nexus_omniverse_v10000` (read on init, write on any state change).
No backend calls are introduced; the app remains local-only state as defined in the V10000 code.

file_operations.description: Delete the entire existing file contents and paste in the exact user-provided V10000 “NEXUS OMNIVERSE” code as a full overwrite, preserving all imports, local mock data/constants, Tailwind classes, UI strings, and interaction logic; ensure the brain persistence key is exactly `nexus_omniverse_v10000` and remains localStorage-based (no backend usage).

requirements.summary: Apply minimal mechanical fixes so the pasted V10000 AppV1 compiles and runs in this repo without changing intended UI/behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: `npm run build` and `npm run dev` succeed without runtime crashes on initial load.
Any compile/runtime fixes are strictly mechanical (import/identifier/JSX wiring) and do not alter visible design, text, or flow behavior described by the V10000 code.
All referenced icons/components/hooks used in JSX are defined/imported (e.g., lucide-react icons, Framer Motion exports, React hooks like `useRef`).

file_operations.description: Make only mechanical build/run fixes required by the repository setup: add/adjust missing React hook imports (e.g., useRef), ensure any referenced identifiers in JSX exist, resolve invalid/imbalanced JSX, ensure any referenced icons/components are correctly imported/declared, and ensure exports are valid (no duplicate defaults), without changing the intended layout/styling/copy/interaction logic from V10000.

If (and only if) the V10000 code references custom animation utility class names or keyframes not currently defined, add the minimal corresponding CSS definitions here to avoid runtime/visual errors, without altering existing theme tokens or global styling behavior.

requirements.summary: Preserve existing app entry wiring (App.tsx remains a thin AppV1 wrapper; app mounts via main.tsx) and avoid edits to immutable entry paths.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/App.tsx` remains functionally unchanged (still renders `AppV1` as the root).
No edits are made to immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
The app still boots through the existing Vite/React entry and renders the new V10000 AppV1 UI.

file_operations.description: Add a short internal note documenting the required entry wiring invariants for this repo (App.tsx must remain a thin wrapper rendering AppV1; main.tsx continues to mount App), and explicitly state that these files must not be modified for this build.
